getBestDirection

private Direction getBestDirection()
Returns the best direction to go, according to Floodfill, from the current MazeCell. This algorithm biases in the following order: Straight, North, East, West, South

getNeighborDistance

private int getNeighborDistance(MazeCell here,
                                Direction direction)
Returns the distance of the MazeCell adjacent to the passed MazeCell and is adjacent in the specified direction.

floodfill

private void floodfill()

blockOutCenter

private void blockOutCenter()
This helper function should only be called when first entering the center goal. Sets the maze knowledge of the algorithm to think that there are no other ways out of the center because according the American rules there is only one entrance/exit associated with the goal.

atGoal

private boolean atGoal()
Returns true if the current location of the robot is its current destination.

checkWalls

private void checkWalls()
Updates the algorithm's memory of the maze based upon the walls in the current cell.

isInTurboMode

public boolean isInTurboMode()
Returns the "turbo" state of the algorithm. Will be true when areas are being traversed after they have been explored before.

Overrides:
isInTurboMode in class RobotBase

getUnderstandingInt

public int[][] getUnderstandingInt()
Returns the instance of how the algorithm understands the maze. For Floodfill this is an integer for each cell representing the expected distance from the center.

Overrides:
getUnderstandingInt in class RobotBase
